column1: URGENT! your account has been compromised. resolve on this link:

Hi,

We're conducting a brief survey to better understand consumer preferences regarding [generic product category, e.g., "online shopping," "streaming services," "home appliances"]. Your valuable feedback will help shape future products and services.

The survey takes approximately 5-7 minutes to complete. As a token of our appreciation, all participants who complete the survey will receive a $10 Amazon Gift Card (or similar modest incentive) credited to their email address.

Click here to start the survey now:

Link: hxxps://survey.global-feedback-platform.biz/start

Thank you for your time and contribution!

Best regards,

The Consumer Insights Team
